00027 #ifndef PLANCK_FFTPACK_H
00028 #define PLANCK_FFTPACK_H
00029 
00030 #ifdef __cplusplus
00031 extern "C" {
00032 #endif
00033 
00034 /*! forward complex transform */
00035 void cfftf(int N, double complex_data[], double wrk[]);
00036 /*! backward complex transform */
00037 void cfftb(int N, double complex_data[], double wrk[]);
00038 /*! initializer for complex transforms */
00039 void cffti(int N, double wrk[]);
00040 
00041 /*! forward real transform */
00042 void rfftf(int N, double data[], double wrk[]);             
00043 /*! backward real transform */
00044 void rfftb(int N, double data[], double wrk[]);
00045 /*! initializer for real transforms */
00046 void rffti(int N, double wrk[]);
00047 
00048 #ifdef __cplusplus
00049 }
00050 #endif

00052 #endif
